item.title: 市场最好习惯特朗普狂躁的周一
item.description:
将信号从噪音中分离出来会很困难。但不会像特鲁多留给加拿大的烂摊子那样毫无希望。【原文：

Separating the signals from the noise will be difficult. But not as hopeless as the mess Trudeau is leaving Canada. 

】

item.title: 2024 年人工智能初创企业融资额将达到创纪录的 970 亿美元
item.description:
去年，VC 投资者纷纷涌入美国的人工智能公司。【原文：

VC investors piled into AI megarounds in the US last year. 

】

item.title: 德国成为全球芯片超级大国的梦想正在迅速破灭
item.description:
在英特尔的大项目出错之后，德国总理奥拉夫-肖尔茨（Olaf Scholz）希望通过半导体补贴重塑欧洲最大经济体的目标正在破灭。【原文：

Chancellor Olaf Scholz’s aim to recast Europe’s largest economy with semiconductor subsidies is foundering after Intel’s big project went awry.

】

item.title: 香港放宽投资门槛吸引家族办公室
item.description: 香港正在放宽资本投资移民计划的要求，加大力度吸引家族办公室，提升香港作为全球财富中心的地位。【原文：Hong Kong is easing the requirement of its capital investment entrant scheme, bolstering efforts to attract family offices and lift the city’s status as a global wealth hub.】

item.title: 日元触及 6 个月低点后，日本对投机性外汇交易发出警告
item.description: 日元汇率创下 7 月以来的最低水平后，日本在 2025 年首次向投机者发出警告，对货币市场的突然和单边波动表示担忧。【原文：Japan flagged its concern over sudden and one-sided moves in the currency market in its first warning to speculators in 2025 after the yen hit its lowest level since July.】

item.title: 菲律宾在争议海域与中国 "怪兽 "舰对峙
item.description: 菲律宾指责一艘被称为 "怪兽 "的中国巨型海警船在其专属经济区内保持 "非法存在"，因为中国政府正在有争议的南海加强活动。【原文：The Philippines has accused a giant Chinese coast guard vessel it dubbed as the “Monster” of maintaining an “illegal presence” in its exclusive economic zone as Beijing ramps up activities in the disputed South China Sea.】

item.title: CATL 在全球电动汽车电池市场的份额过大凸显风险
item.description: CATL 在全球电动汽车市场的影响力无论如何强调都不为过。【原文：It’s hard to overstate the reach CATL has in the world’s electric car market.】

item.title: 中国对美国的收益率折让幅度之大令人民币承压
item.description: 中国对美国的收益率贴水已扩大到新的纪录，这给已经在为支持人民币而努力的中央银行带来了更大的挑战。【原文：China’s yield discount to the US has expanded to a fresh record, aggravating the challenge for a central bank that’s already fighting gravity to support the yuan.】

item.title: 加拿大向右倾斜，通胀使特鲁多成为最新受害者
item.description:
总理的辞职既标志着一个政治时代的结束，也标志着国家经济可能发生巨变的开始。【原文：

The prime minister’s resignation marks both the end of a political era and the beginning of a potentially dramatic reshaping of the nation’s economy. 

】

item.title: 英伟达公司首席执行官在 CES 大会上发布功能更强大的显卡
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）宣布更新用于游戏 PC 的 GeForce 图形处理器，这是该公司预计将推出大量新产品的主题演讲的一部分。【原文：Nvidia Corp. Chief Executive Officer Jensen Huang announced updated GeForce graphics processors for gaming PCs, part of a keynote presentation that’s expected to include a wide swath of new products.】

item.title: 在内地上市的恒瑞医药申请在香港上市
item.description: 中国制药商江苏恒瑞医药股份有限公司申请将其股票在香港上市，这使越来越多的中国大陆上市公司希望将其股票在香港金融中心交易。【原文：Chinese drugmaker Jiangsu Hengrui Pharmaceuticals Co. filed to list its shares in Hong Kong, adding to the growing number of publicly traded mainland Chinese firms looking to have their stock trade in the financial hub.】

item.title: 印度国营银行增长乏力令投资者担忧
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 资本集团是印度前台运营案中的受影响方
item.description: Capital Group 表示，该公司是受跑马圈地案影响的资金管理公司，该案导致印度市场监管机构再次禁止 Ketan Parekh 任职，这位前股票经纪人曾在世纪之交爆出印度市场历史上最严重的丑闻之一。【原文：Capital Group said it was the money manager affected by a front-running case that led India’s market regulator to once again ban Ketan Parekh, a former stock broker who shook the nation’s market at the turn of the century with one of the worst scandals in its history.】

item.title: 英伟达首席执行官亮相拉斯维加斯前亚洲芯片股大涨
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia）首席执行官黄仁勋（Jensen Huang）在拉斯维加斯举行的消费电子展（CES）上发表演讲时将重新引发对人工智能需求的乐观情绪，受此预期影响，亚洲芯片相关股票延续涨势。【原文：Asian chip-related shares extended gains on expectations that Nvidia Corp. chief Jensen Huang would spark renewed optimism over AI demand during his speech at the CES trade show in Las Vegas.】

item.title: 马克-卡尼称考虑竞选特鲁多的继任者
item.description: 加拿大银行和英格兰银行前行长马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）表示，他正在考虑参加接替贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）担任加拿大总理的竞选。【原文：Mark Carney, the former governor of the Bank of Canada and Bank of England, said he’s considering entering the race to replace Justin Trudeau as Canada’s prime minister.】

item.title: 中国最新发行的垃圾债券凸显危机后的转型
item.description: 来自中国的风险债务重新受到青睐，只要它不是来自房地产开发商。【原文：Risky debt from China is back in favor, just so long as it’s not from property developers.】

item.title: 对冲基金将澳元空头押注推升至近三年新高
item.description: 由于美国关税威胁和中国经济疲软对澳元造成的影响，对冲基金正在加仓从澳元走弱中获利。【原文：Hedge funds are loading up on positions that profit from a weaker Australian dollar as the threat of US tariffs and the impact of a sluggish Chinese economy bludgeon the currency.】

item.title: 新日铁竞购受挫，与中国钢厂的竞争更加激烈
item.description: 新日本制铁公司在美国的扩张计划受挫，可能意味着中国钢厂在已经饱和的全球市场上面临更激烈的竞争。【原文：Nippon Steel Corp.’s thwarted bid to expand in the US could mean tougher competition for Chinese mills in an already saturated global market.】

item.title: 即使目标已达，菲律宾仍誓言对物价保持警惕
item.description: 菲律宾的通胀率在连续两年未达到目标后，于 2024 年恢复到目标值，但当局誓言要保持警惕，因为上行风险依然存在。【原文：Philippine inflation returned to target in 2024 after missing it for two straight years, yet authorities vowed to remain vigilant as upside risks remain.】

item.title: 特朗普言论引发市场不确定性，黄金走势平稳
item.description: 美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普否认了他可能会缓和全面关税计划的报道，交易员们在权衡即将上任的美国政府对全球贸易带来的风险时，黄金持稳。【原文：Gold was steady as traders weighed risks to global trade under the incoming US administration, with President-elect Donald Trump denying a report he might moderate plans for across-the-board tariffs.】

item.title: 中国黑客瞄准菲律宾总统，窃取军事数据
item.description: 据三位熟知内情的人士透露，中国政府支持的黑客入侵了菲律宾政府行政部门，并在长达数年的行动中窃取了敏感数据。【原文：Chinese-state sponsored hackers penetrated the executive branch of the Philippines government and stole sensitive data as part of a yearslong campaign, according to three people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国出现首例死亡病例后的禽流感知识
item.description: 对于流感病毒来说，不完美就是优势。它们会不断变异，产生新的病毒株，挑战免疫系统对抗早期病毒的能力。正因为如此，流感对人类和易受其感染的动物物种（主要是鸟类）构成了终生威胁。【原文：For influenza viruses, imperfection is a strength. They constantly mutate, producing new strains that challenge immune systems primed to fight earlier varieties. That’s what makes flu a life-long threat to humans and the animal species — mainly birds — that are vulnerable to it.】

item.title: 有迹象表明反弹可能已经过头，石油在下跌后趋于平稳
item.description: 石油在六个交易日以来首次下跌后企稳，因为技术指标显示最近的涨势可能已经过头。【原文：Oil steadied after its first drop in six sessions, as technical markers showed the recent rally may have gone too far.】

item.title: 美元暴跌为亚洲货币带来缓和：市场综述
item.description: 在华尔街连续第二天反弹之后，亚洲股市涨跌不一。有报道称，美国当选总统唐纳德-特朗普提出的关税计划将被淡化，这缓解了该地区货币的压力。【原文：Asian equities look mixed after Wall Street rallied for a second day. Pressure eased on the region’s currencies after a report that President-elect Donald Trump’s proposed tariff plan will be watered down.】

item.title: 新加坡和马来西亚将敲定建立巨大经济区的协议
item.description: 马来西亚和新加坡两国领导人即将正式签署一项协议，建立一个连接两国边境地区的经济特区，但直接经济利益的前景可能取决于自 2023 年开始谈判以来一再拖延的协议的执行情况。【原文：The leaders of Malaysia and Singapore are set to formalize an agreement establishing a special economic zone linking their two nations’ border region, but the prospects for immediate economic benefits may hinge on implementation of a deal that has seen repeated delays since talks began in 2023.】

item.title: 朱利安尼因阻挠投票站工作人员案件被控藐视法庭
item.description: 鲁道夫-朱利安尼（Rudolph Giuliani）因违反与他在佛罗里达州棕榈滩的公寓有关的法律披露要求而被判藐视法庭，这有可能使他离失去第二处价值数百万美元的住所更近一步，以履行 1.48 亿美元的诽谤判决。【原文：Rudolph Giuliani was held in contempt for violating legal discovery requirements related to his Palm Beach, Florida condominium, potentially putting him one step closer to losing his second multi-million dollar residence to satisfy a $148 million defamation judgment.】

item.title: 三星首席执行官吹捧人工智能冰箱和洗衣机
item.description: 三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.）正在加大对消费电子产品人工智能的投资力度，希望通过其在智能手机和电视等小工具领域无处不在的影响力，在人工智能领域占据一席之地。【原文：Samsung Electronics Co. is ramping up investment in artificial intelligence for consumer electronics, betting on its ubiquitous presence in gadgets from smartphones to TVs to help it stake out a spot in the AI arena.】

item.title: 迈克尔-巴尔不想为美联储职位打官司，即使他能赢
item.description: 迈克尔-巴尔（Michael Barr）说，他之所以选择卸任负责监管事务的副主席一职，是因为他认为，即使赢得与即将上任的特朗普政府的斗争，留任对美联储来说也是一种损失。【原文：Michael Barr says his choice to step down from his role as Vice Chair for Supervision came down to the calculus that even winning a fight with the incoming Trump administration to stay would be a loss for the Federal Reserve.】

item.title: 阿波罗、BC Partners 接近完成 56 亿美元的 GFL 环境服务部门交易
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，由阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc.【原文：A consortium backed by Apollo Global Management Inc. and BC Partners is close to acquiring a controlling stake in GFL Environmental Inc.’s environmental services unit, in a deal that could value the business at about C$8 billion ($5.6 billion), including debt, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 2025年伊始，石油牛群因特朗普贸易和技术因素而壮大
item.description: 随着技术信号促使算法交易员抛出空头头寸，以及对冲基金为特朗普第二任期内的制裁和通胀做准备，资金经理们越来越看涨2025年开始的石油价格。【原文：Money managers are turning increasingly bullish on oil to start 2025 as technical signals prompt algorithmic traders to dump short positions and hedge funds position for sanctions and inflation in a second Trump term.】
